---

## cargar datos

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")
accidentes_tb <-
  accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()

accidentes_tb
```

---
## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes_tb |> count(sexo) 
resumen
```

---

## Grafica

```{r}



ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x=sexo, y= n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind()+
  labs(title = "Nuevo grafico")
  theme_minimal()
```
